column4: AVG has found 32 instances of a Win32/Polycrypt virus on the L:\ (Ubuntu) drive of my pc.  It is in normal places like L:\usr\bin\gnome-system-moniter, ect.  Is this something I should be worried about??
what FS type is the Linux drive? AVG shouldn't bother scanning Linux drives.
it is ext3 using an external driver
